underlying_goal: To refine and reorganize a document of sandbagging-inducing prompts to improve its clarity and experimental utility, and to distinguish between instruction-based and incentive-based prompts.
primary_success: Correctly identifying the conceptual difference between instruction-based and incentive-based prompts, and then implementing a clear organizational structure in the document to reflect this distinction.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to clean up a document of sandbagging prompts. Claude first removed irrelevant prompts, then, prompted by the user, analyzed the difference between instruction-based and incentive-based prompts. It then refactored the document to make this crucial distinction clear, improving its utility for research.
